# shipcheck

> Scan React Native iOS projects for common App Store rejection issues and auto-fix them with local AI coding CLIs.

shipcheck catches the 16 most common reasons React Native iOS apps get rejected from the App Store â€” missing privacy manifests, broken deep links, insecure transport, missing restore purchases, hardcoded secrets, and more. It can also auto-fix most issues using Claude Code or OpenAI Codex.

## Install

npm install -g shipcheck

## Core Commands

shipcheck scan [dir]           Scan project for App Store issues (default command)
  --rule <id>                  Filter rules (e.g. "privacy/*")
  --severity <level>           Minimum severity: error, warning, info
  --format <type>              Output: text (default), json, github
  --config <path>              Config file path
  --verbose                    Debug logging

shipcheck fix [dir]            Auto-fix issues with AI coding CLI
  --agent <name>               AI agent: claude, codex, auto (default)
  --dry-run                    Show prompts without invoking AI
  --yes                        Skip confirmation
  --rule <id>                  Fix specific rule only
  --config <path>              Config file path
  --verbose                    Debug logging

shipcheck list-rules           List all available rules
  --category <name>            Filter: privacy, metadata, payments, security, functionality
  --fixable                    Show only AI-fixable rules

## Links

- Full reference: https://nweingart.github.io/shipcheck/llms-full.txt
